motd: Bugfix: If multiple Axiom Arc owners on the same team take down the same target, all of them now properly gain Flux's cooldown reduction, instead of only the killer.

passive_1: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 15% (+0.15% per 1 Lethality) of your ultimate ability's total cooldown. Does not reduce cooldown below 0.5 seconds.

Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 10% (+0.3% per 1 Lethality) of your ultimate ability's total cooldown. Does not reduce cooldown below 0.5 seconds.

Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 10% (+0.4% per 1 Lethality) of your ultimate ability's total cooldown. Does not reduce cooldown below 0.5 seconds.

Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 5% (+0.4% per 1 Lethality) of your ultimate ability's total cooldown. Does not reduce cooldown below 0.5 seconds.

motd: Bugfix: Flux now stacks correctly with the Ultimate Hunter rune.

passive_1: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 20% of your ultimate ability's total cooldown. Does not reduce cooldown below 0.5 seconds.
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 25% of your ultimate ability's total cooldown. Does not reduce cooldown below 0.5 seconds.
